title: WfExS-backend exports definition
description: WfExS-backend stage definition file (EOSC-Life Demonstrator 7 JSON Schemas)

id.title: A unique, symbolic name for this export action

plugin.title: The plugin to be used to export the contents, and obtain a permanent / public identifier

preferred-pid.type: Preferred permanent id to be assigned
preferred-pid.documentation: Some export plugins are able to (or even have to) choose the permanent identifier to assign. Others will ignore this

preferred-scheme.documentation: Very few export plugins are able to provide permanent ids in several schemes. Even fewer have to know it. Most of them will ignore this

security-context.documentation: The name of the most of the time required security context to be used to authenticate in order to export the resource

setup.documentation: Optional parameters to be passed to set up the export plugin, containing details like the server to connect to
